name: Easy Scroll To Top
author: Ariful Islam

sections.description: Easy Scroll To Top is a WordPress plugin to add a button that appears only when users scroll down the page allowing them to scroll to the top of the page. No need to configure, just active the plugin. Then automatically a scroll up button will be appear on the bottom of your scrolling pages.
sections.installation:
Through Dashboard

  1. Log in to your WordPress admin panel and go to Plugins -> Add New
    .2. Type easy scroll to top in the search box and click on search button.
  2. Find easy scroll to top plugin.
  3. Then click on Install Now after that activate the plugin.
  4. Now check your scrolling pages.

Installing Via FTP

  1. Download the plugin to your hardisk.
  2. Unzip.
  3. Upload the “easy-scroll-to-top” folder into your plugins directory.
  4. Log in to your WordPress admin panel and click the Plugins menu.
  5. Then activate the plugin.
  6. Now check your scrolling pages.

short_description: Stable tag: 1.0 Easily scroll back to the top of your website pages. License: GPLv2 or later License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0
